name: Kitchen
longDes: You enter what seems to be a kitchen. You can faintly smell the aroma of freshly-baked bread. There are large doors to the North and East leading to adjoining rooms. Along the North wall, there is a large sink with a window above it. There is also a row of drawers along the Northern wall next to the Range. Just as you finish a quick survey of the room, you notice something (or someone) move in the corner of your eye. It’s rapidly moving towards you!
shortDes: You are in the Mansion's kitchen. The door to the North goes to the Rose Garden. The door to the East is the formal Dining Room.

features.name: chef
features.preActionDes: The undead chef sneers at you. Clearly he doesn’t want you here.

features.name: drawer
features.preActionDes: This drawer is locked. You can't open it, but there is a keyhole.
features.inActionDes: You unlock the drawer and notice, among other utensils, a knife.
features.postActionDes: This is where you found the knife.

features.name: sink
features.preActionDes: The sink is dirty and it stinks.

features.name: window
features.preActionDes: You can see the garder and gazebo through the window.
